mapper.insert: insert into promotions (id, title, body, countryid, categoriesid,photourl,price,createdate) values (seq_promotions.nextval, #{title},#{body},#{countryid},#{categoriesid}, #{photourl}, #{price},sysdate )
mapper.update: update promotions set title = #{title}, body = #{body}, photourl = #{photourl}, price = #{price}, createdate = sysdate WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select title, body, countryid, categoriesid, photourl, price, createdate from promotions WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY title ASC
